text: James Ryan Hayes (November 21, 1989 â€“ August 23, 2021) was an American professional ice hockey right winger. He played in the National Hockey League from 2011 until 2018. He played for the Chicago Blackhawks, Florida Panthers, Boston Bruins and New Jersey Devils. Hayes was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Hayes died on August 23, 2021 in Milton, Massachusetts. He was 31 years old.Former NHLer Jimmy Hayes passes away at 31 TSN.ca: Former NHLer Jimmy Hayes Passes Away At 31, August 23, 2021 A toxicology report said that Hayes died from a mix of fentanyl and cocaine use. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:Florida Panthers players Category:New Jersey Devils players Category:Rockford IceHogs (AHL) players Category:Sportspeople from Boston
title: Jimmy Hayes (ice hockey)
